name: MUD
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  MUD – FIM Motocross World Championship is the only game to exclusively include three official competitions: The MX1 and MX2 championships, and the epic 2011 Monster Energy FIM Motocross of Nations, which is a massive worldwide annual event that represents all of the leading riders, teams and motorbikes across the motocross world. The product boasts a brand new game engine, 12 Grand Prix races of the 2011 FIM Motocross World Championship season, the official track locations, and 3 huge arenas for freestyle stunts, featuring different terrain conditions that promise to deliver the most challenging and fulfilling motocross gaming experience. Play a pure, absolute Motocross and muddy Freestyle like never before!
